text:
Yeah! I will be sure to match the levels next time. I did use a light wrap but didn’t edge blur. The crop is a very good point. I was wondering how I could effectively comp it but in reality a shot like that wouldn’t likely be in 16:9 anyway. Thank you!

In the meantime, I’ve had quite a short-notice confirmation that I can show my reel at the next QVFX meet-up on Thursday. They’re making very clear it’s a casual and constructive setting but nevertheless it’s scary stuff and I obviously still want to put my best foot forward. They want my reel by the end of the day today. Here’s what I’ve got: <https://youtu.be/_JaWRap24t8>  I’m going to ask my tutors at Escape today too but if you’ve got any pointers you can offer about my reel or about standing up and showing it to a room full of professionals I’d really appreciate it!
